org.nodes.motifs

Class DPlainMotifExtractor<L extends java.lang.Comparable<L>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nodes.motifs.DPlainMotifExtractor<L>

  • public class DPlainMotifExtractor<L extends java.lang.Comparable<L>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Extracts motifs from a DGraph by sampling. This extractor does not perform masking. It simply returns the subgraphs that best compress the structure. If labels are to be ignored, the graph should be blanked beforehand.
    Author:
    Peter
